nodes.text: Dassa Borkannits was the Director of Communications for the Jrade District of Galactic City during the Clone Wars. Following the death of Finis Valorum, former Supreme Chancellor of the Galactic Republic, in a terrorist attack on Jrade Plaza, the place was shut down for security investigations for several weeks. When the plaza reopened for the unveiling of the Finis Valorum Memorial, Borkannits worked on reassuring the people of Galactic City that the premises were safe again.
